content: c h u n k y b a b y h a t two very simple circular hats sized for newborns perfect for charity projects or to use up chunky yarn in your stash choice of two styles either fully ribbed or ribbed brim with stockinette body both are knit in the round from the brim up with crown decreases and sew through the last live stitches to cast off skill level easy knitting in the round rib stitch stocking stitch decreases and draw through live stitches to cast off yarn the pattern paintbox simply chunky cast on 44 stitches and join in the round 100% acrylic 100g ball/ 136m each place stitch marker to mark bor if hat uses approximately 27g of yarn using one *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round this forms the k2p2 rib needles 5 5mm needle of your choice for fully ribbed version knit in the k2p2 rib circular knitting 80cm cable length on as established for approximately fixed circular needles or 15cm length 13cm/ 5 from cast on edge double pointed needles move on to crown shaping notions darning needle stitch markers snips stocking stitch version knit in the k2p2 rib tape measure as established for 3 5cm/ 1 25 next round k every stitch continue gauge and sizing fully ribbed knitting as set until hat measures 22 stitches x 20 row to make approximately 13cm/ 5 from cast on edge 10x10cm/ 4x4 in k2p2 rib unblocked move on to crown shaping stocking stitch with ribbed brim crown shaping for both hats 15 stitches x 24 row to make *k2 p2tog repeat from * to end of round 10x10cm/ 4x4 in stocking stitch 32 stitches unblocked *k2 p1 repeat from * to end of round to fit newborns head circumference *k2tog p1 repeat from * to end of round 35 5cm to 40 5cm 20 stitches *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round glossary ssk each pair of stitches to end of k knit round 10 stitches k2p2 rib knit two purl two rib k every stitch to end of round k2tog knit two together p2tog purl two together cut a 6 tail thread onto darning needle ssk slip slip knit decrease slip next and draw through remaining live stitches two stitches as if to knit insert left to fasten_off hand needle into slipped stitches and knit them together notes this pattern is free to anyone who wants to use it - please be aware that it has not yet been tech edited or tested
